Description: Required Skills To Be Successful•   Experience in working with agile methodologies, digital technologies, Customer Experience, eCommerce, and product management•   Comfortable in ambiguous situations and can apply analytical thinking to guide direction•   Ability to deliver customer strategies through design and product development•   Solid business acumen, with the ability to identify the technology required for products in order to deliver business goals About The TeamThe role will report to Head of Digitisation and closely work with busy automotive aftersales team. What Equips You For The Role•   Bachelor's Degree in Marketing or Technical field, and/or technical leadership role preferred•   Experience of working in, leading, and managing Digital PODs, squads, and tribes•   Experience managing customer centric and data led development practices across several teams•   Experience managing both onsite and remote product and development teams Job Details
